channel.title: Events on lkpa.uk
channel.description: Recent content in Events on lkpa.uk

item.title: Previous Events
item.description: Social contact is important for mental health and wellbeing, we hold events throughout the year for patients and their family members why not come along and join us. We try to arrange a variety of events to suit different tastes and interests. Do you look good in Purple? Join us! SKEGNESS COACH TRIP `24 Sunday 8th September 2024 Always a popular day out for our members, friends and families our Skegness coach trip!
